snippet: The brother and sister, ages 5 and 7, were found in an aboveground pool that an officer said had been improperly fenced.
abstract: Officials in Central Islip, NY, say that two young children, Sharon Knowles and her brother, Ralph, died after being pulled, unconscious, from a neighbor's pool.
lead_paragraph: The brother and sister, ages 5 and 7, were found in an aboveground pool that an officer said had been improperly fenced.

headline.seo: 2 Children Die on Long Island After Being Pulled From Neighbor’s Pool
headline.main: 2 Children Die After Being Pulled From Pool
headline.print_headline: 2 Children Die After Pulled From Pool
